OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive doxorubicin HCl liposome IV 1 hour day 1 gemcitabine IV 30 minute day 1 8 . Courses repeat every 28 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients achieve complete response ( CR ) receive 2 course beyond documentation CR . Quality life assess baseline , day 1 course , end study . Patients follow 4 week every 3 month 5 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 75 patient accrue study .
